definitions.definition: A bihomogeneous polynomial in x , y , ... and the coefficients of some homogeneous form in x , y , ... that is invariant under some group of linear transformations.
The variety defined by a covariant.

main_definition: ( algebra ) A bihomogeneous polynomial in x , y , ... and the coefficients of some homogeneous form in x , y , ... that is invariant under some group of linear transformations.
secondary_definitions: ( algebra ) The variety defined by a covariant.
